dublin_core.dcvalue: Personal portable information technology is advancing at a breathtaking speed Google has recently introduced Glass a device that is worn like conventional glasses but that combines a computerized central processing unit touchpad display screen high definition camera microphone bone conduction transducer and wireless connectivity We have obtained a Glass device through Google s Explorer program and have tested its applicability in our daily pediatric surgical practice and in relevant experimental settings
Google Glass in pediatric surgery: an exploratory study.
